history.proof: intros H_rely H_find. unfold network_rely, find in H_rely, H_find. destruct H_rely as [n H_rely']. shelve.

exceptions.tactic: intros w this s s' m tm from H_rely H_find.

exceptions.exn: In environment w : world this : nid l : Label s, s' : state m : mid tm : TaggedMessage from, n : nat H_rely' : network_rely' n s s' H_find : UMC.find_op (UMC.mixin (UMC.class (union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage)))) m (dsoup (gets s l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := from; to := this; active := true |} The term "n" has type "nat" while it is expected to have type "is_true (this != ?z)".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
w: world
this: nid
l: Ordered.sort Label
s': state
s: state
m: Ordered.sort mid
tm: TaggedMessage
from: nat

Goal:
network_rely s s' -> find m (dsoup (gets s l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := from; to := this; active := true |} -> find m (dsoup (gets s' l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := from; to := this; active := true |}

Premises:
dsoup = fun d : dstatelet => let (_, dsoup) := d in dsoup : dstatelet -> soup
network_rely = fun s1 s2 : state => exists n : nat, network_rely' n s1 s2 : state -> state -> Prop
to : forall mtype : Type, msg mtype -> nat
world = (context * hooks)%type : Type
Notation gets := getStatelet
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
active : forall mtype : Type, msg mtype -> bool
mid = [ordType of nat] : ordType
Record TaggedMessage : Set := TMsg { tag : nat; tms_cont : seq nat } Arguments TMsg _%nat_scope _%seq_scope
content : forall mtype : Type, msg mtype -> mtype
state = union_map Label dstatelet : Type
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
nid = nat : Set
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
find : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (cT : union_map_class K V), K -> cT -> option V
Label = [ordType of nat] : ordType
step_consume_other : forall (l : Label) (s s' : state) (m : mid) (tm : TaggedMessage) (from : nat) (z : nat_eqType), this != z -> network_step w z s s' -> find m (dsoup (gets s l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := from; to := this; active := true |} -> find m (dsoup (gets s' l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := from; to := this; active := true |}
network_step_ind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : Prop), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) -> (forall (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in nodes (getProtocol w l) (gets s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 -> forall S : send_safe st this to (gets s1 l) msg, all_hooks_fire w l (t_snd st) s1 this msg to -> Some b = send_step S -> s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this b (dstate (gets s1 l)); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup (gets s1 l)) {| content := {| tag := t_snd st; tms_cont := msg |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} s1 -> P) ->...-> P
network_step_sind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : SProp), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) -> (forall (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in nodes (getProtocol w l) (gets s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 -> forall S : send_safe st this to (gets s1 l) msg, all_hooks_fire w l (t_snd st) s1 this msg to -> Some b = send_step S -> s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this b (dstate (gets s1 l)); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup (gets s1 l)) {| content := {| tag := t_snd st; tms_cont := msg |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} s1 -> P) ->...-> P
ReceiveMsg : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (rt : receive_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), rt \In get_rt w l -> forall (i : mid) (from : nat) (pf : this \in nodes (getProtocol w l) (gets s1 l)), l \in dom s1 -> forall (C : Coh w s1) (msg0 : TaggedMessage), tag msg0 = t_rcv rt -> [/\ find i (dsoup (gets s1 l)) = Some {| content := msg0; from := from; to := this; active := true |}, msg_wf rt (coh_s l C) this from msg0 & let loc' := receive_step rt from msg0 (coh_s l C) pf in s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this loc' (dstate (gets s1 l)); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup (gets s1 l)) i |} s1] -> network_step w this s1 s2
Inductive network_step (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) : Prop := Idle : s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> network_step w this s1 s2 | SendMsg : forall (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in nodes (getProtocol w l) (gets s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 ->...-> network_step w this s1 s2 Arguments Idle [w] _ [s1 s2] Arguments SendMsg [w this s1 s2 l st] _ [to] [msg]%seq_scope [b] _ _ _ [S] Arguments ReceiveMsg [w this s1 s2 l rt] _ [i] [from]%nat_scope [pf] _ [C msg0]
SendMsg : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in nodes (getProtocol w l) (gets s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 -> forall S : send_safe st this to (gets s1 l) msg, all_hooks_fire w l (t_snd st) s1 this msg to -> Some b = send_step S -> s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this b (dstate (gets s1 l)); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup (gets s1 l)) {| content := {| tag := t_snd st; tms_cont := msg |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} s1 -> network_step w this s1 s2
Record msg (mtype : Type) : Type := Msg { content : mtype; from : nat; to : nat; active : bool } Arguments msg _%type_scope Arguments Msg [mtype]%type_scope _ (_ _)%nat_scope _%bool_scope
is_active = fun (s : soup) (id : mid) => exists m : msg TaggedMessage, find id s = Some m /\ active m : soup -> mid -> Prop
is_consumed = fun (s : soup) (id : mid) => exists m : msg TaggedMessage, find id s = Some m /\ ~~ active m : soup -> mid -> Prop
Ordered.sort = fun t : ordType => let (sort, _) := t in sort : ordType -> Type Ordered.sort is a coercion
empty_dstatelet = {| dstate := empty_lstate [::]; dsoup := Unit |} : dstatelet
find_mark : forall (m : mid) (s' : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)) (msg0 : msg TaggedMessage), valid s' -> find m (consume_msg s' m) = Some msg0 -> exists msg' : msg TaggedMessage, find m s' = Some msg' /\ msg0 = mark_msg msg'
locE : forall (i : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (n : nid) (k : Label) (x : heap) (y : soup), k \in dom i -> valid i -> valid (dstate (gets i k)) -> getl n (gets (upd k {| dstate := upd n x (dstate (gets i k)); dsoup := y |} i) k) = x
prod_ordType = fun K T : ordType => Ordered.Pack {| Ordered.base := prod_eqMixin K T; Ordered.mixin := prod_ordMixin K T |} : ordType -> ordType -> ordType
find_consume : forall (s' : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage))) (id : mid) (m : msg TaggedMessage), valid s' -> find id s' = Some m -> find id (consume_msg s' id) = Some (mark_msg m)
all_hooks_fire = fun (h : hooks) (l : Label) (st : nat_ordType) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (n : nid) (msg : seq nat) (to : nid) => forall (z : nat_ordType) (lc : Label) (hk : hook_type), Some hk = find (z, lc, (l, st)) h -> lc \in dom s -> l \in dom s -> hk (getl n (gets s lc)) (getl n (gets s l)) msg to : hooks -> Label -> nat_ordType -> union_mapUMC Label dstatelet -> nid -> seq nat -> nid -> Prop Arguments all_hooks_fire _ _ _ _ _ _%seq_scope
rely_loc : forall (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label), network_rely s1 s2 -> find this (dstate (gets s1 l)) = find this (dstate (gets s2 l))
heapUMC = UMC.Pack {| UMC.p := fun k : ptr_ordType => k != null; UMC.mixin := heapUMCMix |} : union_map_class ptr_ordType (axioms.dynamic id)
mem = fun (T : Type) (pT : predType T) => let '{| pred_sort := pred_sort0; topred := toP |} as pT0 := pT return (pT0 -> mem_pred T) in fun A : {| pred_sort := pred_sort0; topred := toP |} => ssrbool.Mem [eta toP A] : forall (T : Type) (pT : predType T), pT -> mem_pred T Arguments mem {T}%type_scope {pT} A : rename, simpl never
all = fun (T : Type) (a : pred T) => fix all (s : seq T) : bool := match s with | [::] => true | x :: s' => a x && all s' end : forall T : Type, pred T -> seq T -> bool Arguments all {T}%type_scope _ _%seq_scope
getsE : forall (l : Label) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet), l \in dom s -> find l s = Some (gets s l)
axioms.dyn : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A : ?C), interp A -> {x : ?C & interp x} where ?C : [w : world this : nid l : Label s : state s' : state m : mid tm : TaggedMessage from : nat |- Type]
consume_msg = fun (s : soup) (id : mid) => match find id s with | Some m => upd id (mark_msg m) s | None => s end : soup -> mid -> soup
Coh_dom : forall (w : world) (l : Label) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet), l \in dom s -> Coh w s -> dom (dstate (gets s l)) =i nodes (getProtocol w l) (gets s l)
step_is_local : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label), network_step w this s1 s2 -> forall z : nat_eqType, z != this -> find z (dstate (gets s1 l)) = find z (dstate (gets s2 l))
Mem = fun (T : Type) (pT : PredType T) => nosimpl (let '@PropPredType _ Pred_Sort0 toPred s as pT0 := pT return (pT0 -> Mem_Pred T) in let '@exist _ _ mem _ as s0 := s return (PropPredType s0 -> Mem_Pred T) in mem) : forall (T : Type) (pT : PredType T), pT -> Mem_Pred T Arguments Mem {T}%type_scope {pT}
mark_other : forall (m m' : mid) (s' : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)), valid s' -> (m' == m) = false -> find m' (consume_msg s' m) = find m' s'
Protocols.nodes = fun p : Protocols.protocol => let (nodes, _, coh, snd_trans, rcv_trans, _, _) := p in nodes : Protocols.protocol -> dstatelet -> pred nid
Variant dom_find_spec (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (f : U) : bool -> Type := dom_find_none' : find k f = None -> dom_find_spec k f false | dom_find_some' : forall v : V, find k f = Some v -> f = upd k v (free k f) -> dom_find_spec k f true Arguments dom_find_spec [K] [V]%type_scope [U] _ _ _%bool_scope Arguments dom_find_none' [K] [V]%type_scope [U k f] Arguments dom_find_some' [K] [V]%type_scope [U k f v]
umpleq_some : forall (K : ordType) (A : Type) (U : union_map_class K A) (x1 x2 : U) (t : K) (s : A), valid x2 -> [pcm x1 <= x2] -> find t x1 = Some s -> find t x2 = Some s
tag = fun t : TaggedMessage => let (tag, _) := t in tag : TaggedMessage -> nat
dstate = fun d : dstatelet => let (dstate, _) := d in dstate : dstatelet -> lstate_type heap
Inductive reflect (P : Prop) : bool -> Set := ReflectT : P -> reflect P true | ReflectF : ~ P -> reflect P false Arguments Bool.reflect _%type_scope _%bool_scope Arguments Bool.ReflectT _%type_scope Arguments Bool.ReflectF _%type_scope
post_valid : forall s : soup, valid s -> forall m : msg TaggedMessage, valid (post_msg s m).1
untag = fun t : tagged_heap => let (untag) := t in untag : tagged_heap -> heap untag is a coercion
Equality.sort = fun t : eqType => let (sort, _) := t in sort : eqType -> Type Equality.sort is a coercion
PCM.sort = fun t : pcm => let (sort, _) := t in sort : pcm -> Type PCM.sort is a coercion
tms_cont = fun t : TaggedMessage => let (_, tms_cont) := t in tms_cont : TaggedMessage -> seq nat tms_cont is a coercion
Transitions.send_step_t = fun send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop => forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg -> option heap : (nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop) -> Type Arguments Transitions.send_step_t _%function_scope
Inductive ptr : Set := ptr_nat : nat -> ptr Arguments ptr_nat _%nat_scope

```  
intros w this s s' m tm from H_rely H_find.
unfold network_rely, find in H_rely, H_find.
intros H_rely' H_find'.
destruct H_rely as [n H_rely'].
apply (step_consume_other n H_rely' H_find).
```

original: intros w this s s' m tm from H_rely H_find. unfold network_rely, find in H_rely, H_find. intros H_rely' H_find'. destruct H_rely as [n H_rely']. apply (step_consume_other n H_rely' H_find).
